events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th at 5 PM on Main Street.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning vehicle collision.
Agent Smith was assigned to handle the case involving the car accident reported by the claimant.
The claim acknowledgment email was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
The agent requested the claimant submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
Claimant submitted all required documents including the accident police report and vehicle damage photographs.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and contacting witnesses related to the collision.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault in the car accident on Main Street.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs for the vehicle damages plus rental car expenses.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department based on the investigation and customer agreement.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the claimant for vehicle repairs and rental costs.
The claim related to the auto accident was officially closed after payment confirmation and customer satisfaction.
